entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level 900 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
